casebody.data:
FEDERAL NATIONAL MORTGAGE ASSOCIATION
v.
G. Warren LAWSON et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 24, 2017

G. Warren Lawson, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Tara L. Trifon and Adam Lewis, in opposition.

The named defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 39672) is denied.
